decks.notes: This Mono Black Aggro deck focuses on disruption and efficiency to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It uses cards like Thoughtseize, Grief, and Fell the Profane to disrupt the opponent's strategy while keeping up the pressure with aggressive creatures like Boggart Trawler and Orcish Bowmasters. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Soul Spike to secure the win. Additionally, the deck utilizes Necrodominance and Malakir Rebirth for additional value and flexibility. Overall, this deck aims to be fast, disruptive, and hard-hitting to secure victory in the early to mid game.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Amped Raptor, backed up by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge. The inclusion of cards like Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker add additional threats and disruption to keep the pressure on. The deck also makes use of a companion in Jegantha, the Wellspring for additional flexibility and consistency. Utilizing a mix of creatures, burn spells, and disruption, this deck aims to be fast and relentless in its assault on the opponent.

This deck aims to quickly generate mana through cards like Ruby Medallion and Pyretic Ritual, while also utilizing Ral, Monsoon Mage and Past in Flames to generate mass card advantage. The goal is to set up a massive combo turn using cards like Glimpse the Impossible and Desperate Ritual to cast a lethal Grapeshot, all while protecting your combo with counterspells like Wish. The sidekick Jegantha, the Wellspring provides additional utility and synergy with the deck's strategy. Overall, the deck is focused on assembling the pieces needed for a game-winning combo in the most efficient way possible.

The deck focuses on generating an abundance of mana through cards like Desperate Ritual, Pyretic Ritual, and Ruby Medallion, while also utilizing cards like Manamorphose to draw through the deck quickly. The goal is to cast Glimpse the Impossible to generate a massive Storm count, then finish off the opponent with Grapeshot. Dragon's Rage Channeler and Ral, Monsoon Mage provide additional synergy and card advantage. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells.

The deck focuses on using instant reanimation spells like Goryo's Vengeance and Fallaji Archaeologist to quickly bring out powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. It also utilizes cards like Thoughtseize and Faithful Mending to control the opponent's hand and graveyard. The key strategy is to combo off early and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats, while disrupting their game plan with targeted removal and hand disruption. The deck aims to win quickly through a combination of reanimation and disruption, creating a powerful and aggressive playstyle.

The key concept of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to aggressively control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategies using discard spells like Thoughtseize and aggressive creatures like Grief and Boggart Trawler. The deck also utilizes powerful spells like Necrodominance and Profane Tutor to maintain pressure and close out the game quickly. Additionally, there are cards like Fatal Push and Agadeem's Awakening to handle threats and provide value. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of disruption and aggression to secure victory in Modern 1 vs 1 matches.
